Metadata: This exhibit is now gone and there is no photographic record clear enough to read

The "Science for Sustainable Fisheries" exhibit (displayed at the Hatfield Marine Science Center Visitor Center in Newport, Oregon) contains locally-made scale models of local fishing vessels, each representing a specific fishery from fish (tuna and salmon) to pink shrimp and Dungeness crab. A description of each fishery accompanies each model, along with actual fishing gear. A video demonstrates working excluder devices. A trawl net with an excluder device (and model halibut) hangs overhead.
